item.description:
Everything has changed! Maynard Building Commissioner and Town Administrator CLOSED the Idle Dog on Feb 2. Very disappointing.

So we moved. Meetup will be held at our new site: The Dog Spot cooperative, 165 Broad Street, Hudson. Come see the new building and hear the whole story.

Deb
item.how_to_find_us: For directions, see my website: www.theidledog.com

group.name: The Massachusetts Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: FEB MTG CHANGED
